mobile_first_approach: Design for smallest screen first, then enhance for larger screens
Prioritize essential content and functionality for mobile
Use progressive enhancement to add features for larger screens
Ensure core experience works on any device

flexible_layout_systems.relative_units: Use percentage, em, and viewport units instead of fixed pixels
flexible_layout_systems.container_strategies: Design content containers that work at any width

breakpoint_optimization.device_agnostic_thinking: Design for capabilities and constraints, not specific devices

Implement efficient loading strategies for mobile networks
Minimize layout shifts and ensure fast rendering on all devices
Consider battery and processing limitations of mobile devices
